Articles.Content:
My name is Daniel, I am known as "Psycho8890" on /r/KerbalSpaceProgram.

Some of you folks might have seen my maps I have created of some of the planets in KSP.

For those of you who have no idea what I am talking about, [\[HERE\]](http://imgur.com/a/kBRby) is a little album containing some random maps.

I have decided to finally come to the forums since Reddit is being a little fussy for the time being.

I am looking forward to making this my new home and hopefully entertain you guys with my silly maps!

Take care dudes

Daniel/Cyriak/Psycho8890

Hello Daniel, and welcome to the forums!

I hope you enjoy your newfound home.

Nice maps.

Happy landings!

Thank you Starhawk

Could you tell me where a posts like the maps and stuff I make belongs? I have looked over the forums and the most appropriate place looks like "Fan-art".

Any suggestions?

Yup. You've got it. The [KSP Fan Works](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/40-KSP-Fan-Works) section is the one you want.

I look forward to seeing more of your work.

Happy landings!
